about_the_game:
StarMaker VR is a game designed using music and indicates players sing to play in the game. Listen to authorized music editions from Sony, Warner Bros., etc., and customize your character as you like! We hope that players can redefine themselves with the melodies!

Features

Sing Star

With more than 2 million in the songs library, find the songs you love! Create a Karaoke room in SingStar, listen to music and other players' work, rate other players, sing in the different scenes, or even hold a concert in the virtual environment you created.

Shooting Star

Find the intensity of the music rhythm and choose either distance battle or melee to attack the digital demons, protect the music from being stolen and guard the music world.

Taiko Star

Use your drumsticks to beat the music note, concentrate more on the rhythm of the songs and experience the fun of drumming and get higher scores.

Blade Star

Slash the cubes according to the instructions. Following the directions and colors, shake your body with melodies, and release your soul. Start your music trip in StarMaker VR, and create a new music world. Enjoy yourself and release real soul by shaking your bodies with music rhythm in the game!

Your Assistant

Chat with your AI friend - Calliope, maybe there is a little surprise.

name: StarMaker VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® i7 7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290X equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Start your music journey in StarMaker VR, sing to release the real you and dance with your souls in the melody of the music! You will enjoy what you have changed in this all new experience!
